Posts.Content: BettyTheft wrote: Hi, I had a biopsy of a cluster of papillomas in my breast in March - everything's benign, but there's a pretty large scar and indentation and I'm wondering how long that might take to fill in, if it does fill in, and if anyone has had reconstructive surgery after such a procedure. Thanks everyone, it's freaking me out a little. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsy of large-ish benign scar and large indentation in breast BettyTheft Moderators
